criteria: Accuracy in reading and writing numbers using base-ten numerals
Ability to read and write numbers using number names (word form)
Competence in expressing numbers in expanded form
descriptions: Student is unable to read or write numbers to 1000 using base-ten numerals.
Student can read or write only very basic numbers (e.g., single-digit) using base-ten numerals with significant errors.
Student can read and write some numbers to 1000 using base-ten numerals but makes frequent errors or requires assistance.
Student can read and write most numbers to 1000 using base-ten numerals with occasional minor errors.
Student can accurately read and write numbers to 1000 using base-ten numerals with very few errors.
Student demonstrates consistent accuracy in reading and writing numbers to 1000 using base-ten numerals and can explain the place value concept effectively.
Student is unable to read or write numbers to 1000 using number names.
Student can read or write only very basic numbers using number names with significant errors.
Student can read and write some numbers to 1000 using number names but struggles with more complex numbers or makes frequent errors.
Student can read and write most numbers to 1000 using number names with occasional errors.
Student can accurately read and write numbers to 1000 using number names with few errors.
Student demonstrates consistent accuracy in reading and writing numbers to 1000 using number names and can fluently convert between numeral and word form.
Student does not understand or cannot express numbers in expanded form.
Student attempts to express numbers in expanded form but demonstrates a lack of understanding of place value, resulting in significant errors.
Student can express some numbers in expanded form with limited accuracy or requires significant assistance.
Student can express most numbers in expanded form with occasional minor errors.
Student can accurately express numbers in expanded form with very few errors.
Student demonstrates a strong understanding of place value and can express numbers in expanded form accurately and fluently.
